content.name: NGUYEN NHAT QUANG
content.description: As a full-stack developer proficient in Java, Python, and JavaScript, I specialize in building scalable, high-performance web applications. I focus on writing clean, maintainable code to deliver innovative solutions, with a passion for optimizing sytems and embracing modern frameworks to drive efficiency.
content.school: POSTS AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (PTIT)
content.subject: Multimedia Application Development
content.P1description: BurgerShop is a scalable web app built with Laravel and RESTful APIs for a strong back-end, paired with an optimized MySQL database for efficient data management. It uses Blade Templates for a dynamic, responsive front-end.
content.P2description: SoftwareShop is a scalable web app built with Spring Boot and RESTful APIs for a strong back-end, paired with an optimized MySQL database for efficient data management. It uses Thymeleaf for a dynamic, responsive front-end.
content.P3description: Object Detection App, built with OpenCV, offers real-time object recognition in images or videos, with features like file selection, frame extraction, and image manipulation tools such as rotation and resizing.
content.P4description: CarGame is a thrilling obstacle game developed with Python using the PyGame library, where players dodge obstacles to rack up scores.
content.P5description: DoubleGame is a game built with Godot, where players sharpen their memory by flipping cards to find identical pairs. Each move is recorded, and the winner is the one who matches all pairs with the fewest moves
content.P6description: MusicApp is a sleek, user-friendly app built with Java in Android Studio, perfect for music lovers. It lets you play, organize, and enjoy your favorite songs and playlists on your Android device.
content.thankyou: Thank you for exploring my portfolio

footer.smile: I look forward to working with you
